description:
Kohana has finally arrived at the Hoshinomori School of Magical Arts, her mother`s old school. There she encounters Ichijoji Teika, a handsome student with an enchanting voice, who explains to her the school`s tradition of crowning the year`s most talented students as the Prince and Princess Artista. Will Koahan be able to hone her craft and climb the Scala Artista by the end of the year?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: きらきら花咲くルネッサンス
